author: Edwin Mora, Edwin Mora
title: Nearly Half of World's Population in Lockdown Including Over 250 Million in U.S.
description: About 3.5 billion people across the world, including 251 million in the United States alone, reside in areas that have issued voluntary or mandatory quarantine orders to stem the spread of the novel coronavirus pandemic afflicting the vast majority of the glo…
